name: Gruen Agency
description: Gruen Digital Marketing is a Minnesota-based marketing agency specializing in search engine marketing, social media, online directories, display advertising, PYP, and more. Gruen is a certified Google Partner and accredited professional with Bing Ads. Gruen combines personal contact, customer care and attention to detail with ever-expanding technological capabilities and multi-media resources. Gruen: Thinking strategically. Executing responsibly. Measuring effectively.
